name: She (Sam☆Lewis)
description:
She

She cared

She was so special

She lived many years ago

She was just here

She's gone

She

The Story

The romance has ended, and the adventure is over. All Sophie has left are her memories... and a time machine.

Features

9000+ words, easy to play in one sitting

Mini-map so you don't get lost

Three endings

Girls in love

Please support me so I can keep making stories! ヽ( ˊ ᵕ ˋ)ﾉ.｡.:*☆
